channel.title: Blog by Kelly Onaemor
channel.description: Kelly was born in Warri, Delta state, Nigeria. He was educated at the Federal University of Technology Akure where he received a degree in Mechanical Engineering. He works with a manufacturing company in Lagos and has added value to his degree via professional courses in Automation and Electro-mechanical engineering.

item.title: Perfecting the Art of Perfection
